channel.title: Hobbies on David G. Simmons
channel.description: Recent content in Hobbies on David G. Simmons

item.title: Hobbies
item.description: Some of my Wood Working Projects Update:I’m now starting to sell some of my wood turnings. I’ve been doing woodworking of one form or another for a long time. I love the feel of wood in my hands, and creating something out of wood is one of my favorite things to do. So I do it whenever I can. This is but a small sampling of some of the things I’ve done, and more will surely follow.
